Bernie Sanders , a liberal independent from Vermont, applauded Republicans for picking Ryan, saying that unlike GOP leaders who have been vague about what programs they want to cut, Congressman Ryan has been very clear. He added that Ryan's ideas on squeezing savings from Social Security, Medicare, Medicaid and other programs were "a very wrong approach to take."
